name: Blue Orb
effect: Ongoing: While Kyogre is in your hand, you may put this and Kyogre under your Trainer. If you do, gain Primal Kyogre and put it into your hand.
highlight_effect: When you gain this, put this into play.

name: Mega Absol
effect:
+3 Energy
While this is in your discard pile, if an Attack card is played by any player, you may put this on top of your deck.

name: Mega Altaria
effect:
+4 Energy
At the end of your turn, you may shuffle this into your deck.

name: Mega Blaziken
effect:
+3 Energy
You may destroy a card in your hand or discard pile. If you do, gain +1 Energy and Attack: Each opponent gains a Burn.

name: Mega Evolution
effect: When you play a Pokemon with the Mega Evolve Symbol, you may put this and that Pokemon under your Trainer. If you do, gain the corresponding Mega Evolved Pokemon from the Evolution Stack.
highlight_effect: This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Mega Gardevoir
effect:
+3 Energy
Draw a card.
Defense: You may draw a card, then put this from your hand or discard pile on top of your deck to avoid an Attack.

name: Mega Glalie
effect:
+3 Energy
Put all Freeze from the Destroyed Pile into the Status Condition Stack.
Attack: Each opponent gains a Freeze and puts it into play.

name: Mega Latias
effect:
+4 Energy
Defense: You may reveal this, then discard a card to avoid an Attack.
Search your deck and discard pile for a card with Latios in its name and put it into your hand.

name: Mega Latios
effect:
+4 Energy
Each opponent discards a card with cost 1 or more.
Search your deck and discard pile for a card with Latias in its name and put it into your hand.

name: Mega Manectric
effect:
+3 Energy
Put all Paralyze from the Destroyed Pile into the Status Condition Stack.
Attack: Each opponent gains a Paralyze and puts it into play.

name: Mega Mawile
effect:
+3 Energy and choose an opponent.
Attack: That opponent reveals their hand and discards all Attack cards.
Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, the opponent who controls the source of that Attack reveals their hand and discards all Attack cards.

name: Mega Medicham
effect: Draw two cards, then shuffle your discard pile into your deck. Look at the top five cards of your deck, discard any number of them, then put the rest back in any order.

name: Mega Metagross
effect:
+2 Energy
Gain all Items in the Route, then put an Item from your discard pile into your hand.
Search your deck for an Item and put it into your hand.

name: Mega Rayquaza
effect:
+6 Energy
You may destroy a Status Condition you control in play or in your discard pile.

name: Mega Sableye
effect:
+3 Energy
All Attack cards you play this turn can't be avoided. All Attack cards you play this turn that choose an opponent affect all opponents instead.

name: Mega Salamence
effect:
+3 Energy
Put all cards in the Route on the bottom of the Main Deck, then refill the Route. Gain +1 Energy for each Pokemon and TM / HM in the Route.

name: Mega Sceptile
effect:
+3 Energy
Draw two cards.
Put this in front of your Trainer. At the start of your turn, discard this from play and gain +3 Energy.

name: Mega Swampert
effect:
+4 Energy
Attack: Each opponent discards two random cards.

name: Primal Groudon
effect:
+5 Energy
You may destroy up to two cards in your hand and/or discard pile.

name: Primal Kyogre
effect:
+5 Energy
Attack: Each opponent discards a card.
Attack: Each opponent discards a random card.

name: Red Orb
effect: Ongoing: While Groudon is in your hand, you may put this and Groudon under your Trainer. If you do, gain Primal Groudon and put it into your hand.
highlight_effect: When you gain this, put this into play.
